meanings.definition: Kerns (noun): the part of a metal type projecting beyond the body or shank of the letter
meanings.sent1: The kerns on the letter 'T' make it stand out.
meanings.sent2: The printer carefully adjusted the kerns to ensure precise spacing.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf tried to balance on the kerns of the letter 'A'.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas extended like kerns beyond the boundaries of the page.
meanings.sent5: The kerns, like tiny bridges, connected each letter seamlessly.

meanings.definition: Kerns (verb): to adjust the space between (letters) in printing
meanings.sent1: She kerns the letters meticulously for a polished look.
meanings.sent2: Remember to kern the text for better readability.
meanings.sent3: The graphic designer playfully kerns the words to create visual harmony.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail kerns the text beautifully on the page.
meanings.sent5: Kerning the letters properly can enhance the overall design.
